DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: Chrysler Plans Joint_Venture in Vietnam : The auto_maker , seeking to expand into new markets , said it hopes to build Jeeps , trucks and other vehicles in the country.The deal , expected to be formalized in a_few months , would make Chrysler Corp . the first U.S. car_maker to establish assembly operations in Vietnam , a relatively poor country with unknown potential . Chrysler officials said the company will probably start_out with exports from North_America , followed by assembly of_import kits and eventually a full-fledged manufacturing operation . Earlier this month , Ford Motor Co . announced plans to open showrooms and service facilities in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City ( formerly Saigon ) .
